title: Day 1130
content:
# Day 1130

![[https://x.com/martyrmade/status/1915587888659734930](https://x.com/martyrmade/status/1915587888659734930)](https://miro.medium.com/1*px9bxvI66EVEqqQPNP-5ew.png)

![[https://x.com/martyrmade/status/1915616721383436717](https://x.com/martyrmade/status/1915616721383436717)](https://miro.medium.com/1*98c9jJdEAY3Jkxqy0ZsVkw.png)

I think Darryl Cooper is right here. It's ridiculous that a judge would block requiring citizenship to vote. You don't get to vote in this country if you aren't a citizen. It's not hard to understand.

In better news what a week this was. Bitcoin pumped on a lot of insanely bullish headlines. I got to catch up with the boys last night because Keenan was in town and I nailed an AI presentation at work today which was cool. I'm tired though because I was up late last night, so I'll keep this short.

God is good.

4/25/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
